body.p: To His Excellency Thomas E. Bramlette Gov. of Ky.

The undersigned circuit Judge of the 12th Judicial district of Ky would respectfully represent that Nelson Voluntine Stands indicted in the Knox Circuit Court for the Murder of Walker charged to have been Committed in Knox County Ky on the day of Oct 1864. -- That said Voluntine has flead from Justice & is now at large -- And it has been made to appear to the undersigned that the Same is an aggravated case of Murder & that a reward should be Offered for the apprehention of the perpetrator -- Your Excellency is therefore respectfully requested to issue a reward for the apprehention of Said Valentine -- Barbourville Knox County Ky Sept 22. 1865.

Said Voluntine is about 32 years old: 6 feet high, heavy Eyebrows. dark Skin & dark Eyes. & dark hair. Wears mushtash -- quiet spoken -- prominent front teeth has a scar on the calf of his leg from
gun shot wound -- is a gambler & drinks hard.

Reward.
